title: Jeff Sessions Testifies; GOP Writes Secret Health Care Bill: A Closer Look | Janet Mock
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Attorney General Jeff Sessions' Senate testimony and President Trump's allies call for the firing of the special counsel in charge of the Russia investigation, Robert Mueller.
Author and trans activist Janet Mock explains why her second memoir, Surpassing Certainty: What My Twenties Taught Me, is really the first she wanted to write and why she's hopeful about the future despite the current political climate.
Then, Mock talks to Late Night producer Henry backstage at Late Night about her new podcast "Never Before" and her writing style.
